charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
description.1: The meteorite is considered a <geo>Geo Construct</geo>, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.
description.4: This skill's positioning may be adjusted.
description.6: You spoke with Paimon about the final destination of falling stars.

description.0: Energizing the Geo deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.
description.1: Launches surrounding opponents back and deals <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
description.2: A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.
description.3: The stone wall is considered a <geo>Geo Construct</geo>, and may be used to block attacks.
description.5: You and Paimon studied the pulse of the mountains.

description.0: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as <geo>AoE Geo DMG</geo>.
Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
description.1: A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

description.0: Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
description.1: The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
